name: Resident Evil: Revelations 2 - Episode 3: Judgment
description:
Resident Evil: Revelations 2 - Episode 3: Judgment is an action game developed by Capcom. It came out on 10-03-2015. Capcom published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Resident Evil: Revelations 2 - Episode 3: Judgment on PC and PlayStation 3.
